summary:
This mod changes the appearance of the lute into an acoustic guitar.
Guitar by Stroti /Mod by MurdermiesteR
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Georgia][color=#999999][b][size=6]
Grampas guitarsks [/size][/b][/color][/font][/center][center][size=2][/size]by MurdermiesteR[/center]


[color=#e06666][size=4][u][b]Description:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

[size=3]This Mod replaces the lute in the playing animation with the acoustic guitar from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36969/?]Strotis Resource Pack[/url] .
[/size]It doesn't change any other lute found in the game, just the one that gets played by bards in Bars and such...

The file was made byÂ MurdermiesteR and is published by me with his generous permission !



[color=#dd7e6b][size=4][u][b]Installation:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

[size=2]For[/size] a manual installation simply extract the files from ''Grampas guitarsks-59820-.7z'' into your Skyrim/Data folder.



[color=#ea9999][size=6][u][b]Credits:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

[b][size=4]MurdermiesteR[/size][/b] for making the mod

[b][size=3]Stroti and Tamira[/size][/b] for providing the resource

thanks a lot !!
author: MurdermiesteR
